rooms.description: This area serves as the entrance hall that leads to a spacious living room, dining area and kitchen. The layout is designed following Art Deco aesthetics with geometric patterns, bold outlines and symmetrical proportions.
Adjacent to the living area, the dining space provides a communal area for family meals. Designed with high ceilings and Art Deco elements.
A functional kitchen layout that promotes an efficient workflow with modern appliances integrated into Art Deco design elements.
This area houses storage, laundry and additional utilities. Placed in a corner to adhere to Vastu guidelines.
A fully equipped bathroom with ample space and ventilation. The design ensures privacy while following Vastu principles regarding water placement.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented towards the north, ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Large window placed in the living area for ample natural light, ensuring balanced sunlight and air circulation.
Accessible balcony for the bedroom, providing an outdoor space with a view, designed to complement the Art Deco style.

rooms.description: The master bedroom is spacious and includes a private balcony for relaxation. The interior decor emphasizes Art Deco elegance.
A comfortable bedroom featuring its own balcony, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.
A well-lit bathroom with proper ventilation, designed following Vastu guidelines to ensure comfort and positive energy.

openings.description: Door leading to the balcony in both bedrooms, ensuring direct access to outdoor space.
Windows in the upper floor bedrooms to promote natural light and proper ventilation.

vastu_guidelines: All design elements, including room orientation and openings, adhere to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow and balance.
